emilbackmark wrote:

> Hi all,
>
> I'm running junitreport in Ant on my nightly builds, to create a nice
> HTML report to view every morning. I'm missing an extension of that
> though, namely a tool that reads eg. my TESTS-TestSuites.xml files
> from all nightly builds and produces a graph (eg. bar chart) over
> time, displaying how the software has evolved. Does anyone out there
> know of such a tool?
>

You may be able to build something with JFreeChart:

    http://www.object-refinery.com/jfreechart/
